reviews.review: diger oyunlarla baglamalari cok guzel olmus onun disinda oyundaki posterler, yerler cok guzel tasarlanmis. tek sorun bazen ani donmalar ola biliyor. oyunda tum vigorlari topladim ama bazilari cok gereksiz. vigorlardan kargali, elektrikli olanlari kullanmanizi tavsiye ediyorum , digerleri biraz gereksiz gibi geldi. possesion da cok iyi ama cok salt goturuyor. bu arada infusion topladikca onceliginiz shield olsun, hem bir ozelligi tamamlayip achievement kazanirsiniz. tabii arada salt icin de kullanin

pretty sweet, wraps up the trilogy amazingly.

Excellent story. Excellent gameplay. Excellent graphics. One of my favorite role playing FPS of all time. Even though this game is almost 10 years old it still looks amazing on PC. The story is very interesting and keeps you thinking and engaged. I like how when you respawn the game remembers how many enemies you killed last time so you're not completely starting over again.

Considero que es el mejor juego de la trilogia. Muy buen gameplay y una narrativa Ãºnica. 100% recomendable.

Es un muy buen juego y tiene la mejor jugabilidad de todos los bioshock

This franshise has been and will awlays be my favorite.

Bioshock is the best fps with a complex story in my opinion PERIOD.
The plot is understandabe for most common players but for those who likes a lot of complexity and deep lore, This game brings exactlly that, This game is also a love letter for those who have played the previous games and are big fans of the Bioshock franshise.

This game awnsers a lot of questions and brings out new ones making the story more intresting and captivating.
I know all of this might sound corny and all but it is a very good game.

Guns feel amazing in this game, Music is beatiful and honsetly carrys the game and plot even more.
The movement is also decent and the are many different npcs you have to defeat, The graphics are astounding even for today and the artwork fits perfectly with the theme of the game.

I love replaying this game and all the other ones, It has such a special place in my heart and it will always be like that.
I still feel the same joy playing this game the same way I played it on my ps4 for the first time when it first came out.
The adrenaline, The emotions and the climax of the story is just perfectly crafted.

I would 100% recommend this game even if you arent into fps shooters, It just brings a lot to the table <3

una simple joya este juego

FPSs, in terms of bare mechanics, appeal to me about as much as clicking on icons on a desktop. BioShock Infinite doesn't do enough to get beyond that problem for me. The setting becomes unimportant, the backtracking is always annoying, Elizabeth is just there for the sake of being there, and the player character is tedious.

To this day, the Bioshock series and especially Bioshock Infinite are still my favorite single-player fps. They look great, feel great to play and the atmosphere is something I've not experienced in any other game. Both games have some serious weight in their characters and I love how the they've been written. Main characters and side ones alike.

In Infinite what stands out particularly, is the relationship between the 2 main characters. Their sinergy and interactions with one another makes the game for me.

Played this game when it first came out. I was 10. I remembered nothing whatsoever about the game or its lore except for the fact that I was confused as hell back then about the *cough* ending. I thought if I came back nearly an entire decade later and replayed it again with no spoilers for myself, maybe I would understand the ending better. I played through it all again, remembering literally nothing. I was still confused as fuÑk by the ending. Would look up another quantum mechanics theory again 10/10.
It's okay
Wonderful story telling.  Too bad I cannot save my progress whenever I want.

This game is magnificent. I spent over 10 minutes at the first scene just soaking in the artwork and music. Story line 10/10, Game play 9/10 (only because you cannot manually save due to auto save feature), music 10/10. This is one of the rare few games worth purchasing at full price. Highly recommend this game
A production that has done excellent work in terms of atmosphere and story.
good game, loved everything about it 10/10 for me.
